title: Watermelon and feta salad
ingredients: ['400g (14 oz) watermelon flesh', '2 nectarines or peaches', '170g (6 oz) mixed salad leaves, including rocket and frisée', '200g (7 oz) feta cheese', '2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'juice of ½ lemon', 'pepper', '2 tbsp toasted pumpkin or sunflower seeds']
